title: Twenty App Manifest
description: Schema for Twenty application manifest files

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for validation and IDE support

standardId.description: Unique identifier for the application (UUID format recommended)

label.description: Human-readable display name for the application

description.description: Brief description of what the application does

icon.description: Icon for the application (emoji or icon name)

dependencies.title: The extension's source dependencies
dependencies.description: Source dependencies following the npm package.json dependency format.

devDependencies.title: The extension's source devDependencies
devDependencies.description: Dev dependencies following the npm package.json dependency format.

agents.description: Optional inline agent definitions (agents are typically discovered from the agents/ folder)

objects.description: Optional inline object definitions (objects are typically discovered from the objects/ folder)

examples.label: Customer Support App
examples.description: Comprehensive customer support application with AI agents
